verses.verse: It is actually <S%G3654><s%> reported <S%G191><s%> that there is <S%G3748><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> as is <S%G3748><s%> not even <S%G3761><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, that <S%G5620><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> of you hath <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G3588><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>'s wife <S%G1135><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> puffed up <S%G5448><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> did <S%G3996><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> mourn <S%G3996><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he that had done <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> deed <S%G2041><s%> might be taken away <S%G1808><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%>, being <S%G5613><s%> absent <S%G548><s%> in body <S%G4983><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> present <S%G3918><s%> in spirit <S%G4151><s%>, have already <S%G2235><s%> as though <S%G5613><s%> I were present <S%G3918><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> him that <S%G3588><s%> hath so <S%G3779><s%> wrought <S%G2716><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing <S%G2716><s%>,

in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, 5547, 4863 ye <S%G5216><s%> being gathered together <S%G4863><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G1700><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord2962, 5547 Jesus <S%G2424><s%>,

to deliver <S%G3860><s%> such a one <S%G5108><s%> unto Satan <S%G4567><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the destruction <S%G3639><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> may be saved <S%G4982><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

Your <S%G5216><s%> glorying <S%G2745><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> good <S%G2570><s%>. Know ye <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%> leaveneth <S%G2220><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%>?

Purge out <S%G1571><s%> the old <S%G3820><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be <S%G5600><s%> a new <S%G3501><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> ye are <S%G2075><s%> unleavened <S%G106><s%>. For <S%G1063><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> passover <S%G3957><s%> also hath been sacrificed <S%G2380><s%>, even <S%G2532><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>:

wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let us keep the feast <S%G1858><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> old <S%G3820><s%> leaven <S%G2219><s%>, neither <S%G3366><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of malice <S%G2549><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wickedness <S%G4189><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the unleavened <S%G106><s%> bread of sincerity <S%G1505><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth <S%G225><s%>.
I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my epistle <S%G1992><s%> to have no <S%G3361><s%> company <S%G4874><s%> with fornicators <S%G4205><s%>;

<S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> at all meaning <S%G3843><s%> with the fornicators <S%G4205><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> with the covetous <S%G4123><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> extortioners <S%G727><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> with idolaters <S%G1496><s%>; for <S%G1893><s%> then <S%G686><s%> must ye needs <S%G3784><s%> go out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> as it is <S%G3570><s%>, I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to keep company <S%G4874><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> that is named a <S%G2228><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> be <S%G1510><s%> a <S%G2228><s%> fornicator <S%G4205><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> covetous <S%G4123><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> an idolater <S%G1496><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> a reviler <S%G3060><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> a drunkard <S%G3183><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> an extortioner <S%G727><s%>; with such a one <S%G5108><s%> no <S%G3366><s%>, not to eat <S%G4906><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> have I <S%G3427><s%> to do with judging <S%G2919><s%> them3588, 2532 that are <S%G2532><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>? Do <S%G2919><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> them that are <S%G3588><s%> within <S%G2080><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> them that are without <S%G1854><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%>. <S%G2532><s%> Put away <S%G1808><s%> the <S%G846><s%> wicked man <S%G4190><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> among yourselves <S%G5216><s%>.
